pr_title: Fixing PKCE to work when multiple callback URLs

timeline.message: fix PKCE does not work when multiple callback URLs

timeline.bodyText:
Shall we define a private method like validateCallbackURI(String callbackURI, OAuthAppDO oauth) and move the callback validation logic there?
It would be much easy to refactor in the future when we support multiple callbacks in the future
timeline.author: mefarazath

timeline.message: moving callback validation logic to seperate method

timeline.bodyText: Since regex is derived from app config, shall we that logic also into the private method please?
timeline.author: mefarazath

replies.bodyText: So basically validateCallbackURI logic only takes the callbackURI from the request and appDO object
